metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of the $500 draft and enclosing an updated statement of account. Stearns states that he does not know why Kwan's son has not written to him. Stearns says that he is less satisfied with Sung Sing's school work and believes he is too involved in distractions, such as athletics. His son is also dressing more like the American boys, that is, more extravagantly. He asserts that he is still convinced of Sung Sing's good character.
